Terms of Service

The Mayor's Office for Economic Opportunity
Overview Getting Started Feedback and Support Terms of Service

The Mayor's Office for Economic Opportunity (NYC Opportunity) is committed to sharing open source software that we use in our products. Feel free to ask questions and share feedback. Follow @nycopportunity on Twitter, Facebook, Medium, and Github.
